attributes.action: use whatever means necessary to ensure the prompt release of the new Lightspeed Champion album by Domino Records.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In order to kick start the creative, green, and pleasant side economy in these hard times, much more than direct taxation, low interest rates and subsidies is needed.  We need a monumental album release, to trickle middle class savings back into the everyday ebb and flow of the economy, this could be it.

Some say its a Chopin inspired regal European sound, with piano and Eno style synthesizers.  While others have heard despite this its still surprisingly similar to the last album and will feature guitar shredding and a collaboration with David Bowie.  All we know is, the anticipation is.....

So Gordon, come to the rescue and be a Warp-speed Winner!!!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
